sections.History:
===[[Season 4]]===
In Meereen, the goatherd brings the corpse of his daughter Zalla to Daenerys and tells the story of how a large [[Drogon|dragon]] killed her with its fire. This greatly disturbs Daenerys, which results in her decision to confine [[Viserion]] and [[Rhaegal]] to the catacombs.<ref>"[[The Children]]"</ref>
